00096 void WMG::init(int _N, double _T, double _hCoM)
00097 {
00098     current_step_number = 0;
00099     counter = 0;
00100     halt = 0;
00101     gravity = 9.81; // hard-coded
00102 
00103     N = _N;
00104     hCoM = _hCoM;      
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108     ZMP_ref = new double[NUM_CONTROL_VAR*N];
00109     ind = new int[N];
00110     X = new double[NUM_VAR*N];
00111 
00112 
00113     for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
00114     {
00115         ind[i] = 0;
00116     }
00117     
00118     for(int i=0; i<NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00119     {
00120         X_tilde[i] = 0.0;
00121     }
00122     init_angle = 0;
00123 
00124     T = new double[N];
00125     h = new double[N];
00126     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00127     {
00128         T[i] = _T;
00129         h[i] = hCoM/gravity;
00130     }
00131 
00132     angle = new double[N];
00133     zref_x = new double[N];
00134     zref_y = new double[N];
00135     lb = new double[2*N];
00136     ub = new double[2*N];
00137 }

00161 void WMG::AddFootstep(double x_relative, double y_relative, double angle_relative, int _nSS, int _n, int _RL, double *_d)
00162 {
00163 
00164     // if this is the first ("virtual") step. In this case only x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative are in the world frame
00165     if (FS.size() == 0)
00166     {
00167         FS.push_back(FootStep(angle_relative, Point2D(x_relative,y_relative), _nSS, _n, _RL, _d));
00168     }
00169     else
00170     {
00171         // Calculate (and set) the absolute position and orientation
00172         double a = FS.back().angle + angle_relative;
00173 
00174         Point2D p(FS.back().p.x, FS.back().p.y);        
00175         p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00176         p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00177 
00178         // consistency check 
00179         if (FS.back().RL == _RL)
00180         {
00181             printf("------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00182             printf(" WARNING: Two consecutive right leg (or left leg) supports. \n");
00183             printf("------------------------------------------------------------\n");
00184             return;
00185         }
00186 
00187         FS.push_back(FootStep(a, p, _nSS, _n, _RL, _d));
00188     }    
00189 }

00209 void WMG::AddFootstep(double x_relative, double y_relative, double angle_relative, int _nSS, int _n)
00210 {
00211     // Calculate (and set) the absolute position and orientation
00212     double a = FS.back().angle + angle_relative;
00213     
00214     Point2D p(FS.back().p.x, FS.back().p.y);        
00215     p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00216     p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00217             
00218     FS.push_back(FootStep(a, p, _nSS, _n, -FS.back().RL, FS.back().ctr.d0));
00219 }

00236 void WMG::AddFootstep(double x_relative, double y_relative, double angle_relative)
00237 {
00238     // Calculate (and set) the absolute position and orientation
00239     double a = FS.back().angle + angle_relative;
00240     
00241     Point2D p(FS.back().p.x, FS.back().p.y);        
00242     p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00243     p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00244 
00245     FS.push_back(FootStep(a, p, FS.back().nSS, FS.back().n, -FS.back().RL, FS.back().ctr.d0));    
00246 }

00254 void WMG::FormPreviewWindow()
00255 {
00256     int j, i=0, k = current_step_number;
00257 
00258     while (i < N && k < (int) FS.size()-1) 
00259     {        
00260         j = 1;
00261         while (j <= FS[k].n && i < N)
00262         {
00263             ind[i] = k;
00264             i++;
00265             j++;
00266         }  
00267         k++;   
00268     } 
00269 
00270     // if the reason for exiting the first while loop above is "k == FS.size()-1"
00271     if (i < N) // note that i is incremented once at the end
00272     {    
00273         halt = 1;
00274         printf(" \n\n====================================\n ");        
00275         printf(" WARNING: not enough steps in FS.");
00276         printf(" \n====================================\n\n ");        
00277     }
00278 
00279 
00280     for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
00281     {
00282         angle[i] = FS[ind[i]].angle;
00283         zref_x[i] = FS[ind[i]].p.x;
00284         zref_y[i] = FS[ind[i]].p.y;
00285 
00286         lb[i*2] = -FS[ind[i]].ctr.d[2];
00287         ub[i*2] = FS[ind[i]].ctr.d[0];
00288 
00289         lb[i*2 + 1] = -FS[ind[i]].ctr.d[3];
00290         ub[i*2 + 1] = FS[ind[i]].ctr.d[1];
00291     }
00292 
00293     this->slide();
00294 }

00297 
00303 void WMG::slide()
00304 {
00305     counter++;
00306     
00307     if (FS[current_step_number].n == 1)
00308     {
00309         FS[current_step_number].n--;
00310         current_step_number++;
00311     }
00312     else
00313     {
00314         FS[current_step_number].n--;
00315     }
00316 }

00321 void WMG::print_ind()
00322 {
00323     printf("\n (counter = %i) ind = [",counter);
00324     for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
00325         printf(" %i ", ind[i]);
00326     printf("] (current_step_number = %i) (%i) \n", current_step_number, FS[current_step_number].n);    
00327 }

00332 void WMG::FS2file()
00333 {
00334     
00335     FILE *file_op = fopen("output/foot_steps_cpp.m", "w");
00336     
00337     if(!file_op)
00338     {
00339         std::cerr << "Cannot open file (for writing) " << std::endl;
00340         return;
00341     }
00342     
00343     fprintf(file_op,"%%\n%% Footsteps generated using the c++ version of the WMG\n%%\n\n");
00344     
00345     //fprintf(file_op,"clear;clc;\n\n");
00346     
00347     int i;
00348     for (i=0; i< (int) FS.size(); i++ )
00349     {
00350         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).a = %f;\nFS(%i).p = [%f;%f];\nFS(%i).Offset = [%f;%f];\nFS(%i).d = [%f;%f;%f;%f];\n", 
00351                 i+1, FS[i].angle, 
00352                 i+1, FS[i].p.x, FS[i].p.y, 
00353                 i+1, FS[i].Offset.x, FS[i].Offset.y,
00354                 i+1, FS[i].ctr.d[0], FS[i].ctr.d[1], FS[i].ctr.d[2], FS[i].ctr.d[3]);
00355 
00356         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).D = [%f %f;%f %f;%f %f;%f %f];\n", 
00357                 i+1, FS[i].ctr.D[0], FS[i].ctr.D[4],
00358                      FS[i].ctr.D[1], FS[i].ctr.D[5],
00359                      FS[i].ctr.D[2], FS[i].ctr.D[6],
00360                      FS[i].ctr.D[3], FS[i].ctr.D[7]); 
00361 
00362         fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).v = [%f %f;%f %f;%f %f;%f %f];\n\n", 
00363                 i+1, FS[i].ctr.vert[0].x, FS[i].ctr.vert[0].y, 
00364                      FS[i].ctr.vert[1].x, FS[i].ctr.vert[1].y, 
00365                      FS[i].ctr.vert[2].x, FS[i].ctr.vert[2].y, 
00366                      FS[i].ctr.vert[3].x, FS[i].ctr.vert[3].y); 
00367 
00368     }
00369 
00370     fprintf(file_op,"hold on\n");    
00371     fprintf(file_op,"for i=1:length(FS)\n");
00372     fprintf(file_op,"    plot(FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','g','MarkerSize',4)\n");
00373     fprintf(file_op,"%%    plot_ConvHull(FS(i).v, 'g')\n");
00374     fprintf(file_op,"%%    plot(FS(i).v(:,1),FS(i).v(:,2),'bs')\n"); 
00375     fprintf(file_op,"    plot_ConvHull(Constraints2Vert(-FS(i).D,FS(i).d), 'r--')\n");
00376     fprintf(file_op,"end\n");
00377     fprintf(file_op,"grid on; axis equal\n");
00378 
00379     fprintf(file_op,"\n%% Note: the -FS(i).D is because Constraints2Vert expects constraints of the form D*z+d>=0.\n");
00380     
00381     fclose(file_op);  
00382 }
